gradegm.text: You return home to find your father standing outside shaking his head.

popularitygm.text: The rumors about you start to boil over and you are being put under investigation.

popularitygm_final.text: Don Austin decides that it is best to put you in a RESPOELESLEF social rehabiliation course.

stressgm.text: The stress starts to become too much.

reputationgm.text: All of your teachers hate you.

reputationgm_final.text: You are expelled after being sent to the office 24 times in a row.
